children.text: 我对音乐的兴趣常常出于对于自己彼时处境寻求共鸣的念头。于是这种兴趣就常常摇摆。当然寻求共鸣是一种本能，但是站在文艺的角度来看，如果总是在横向摇摆而没有纵向的上升，我觉得就可以称之为投机主义了。也许可以说，关于文艺，每个人都是投机主义者。

title: 与自由为敌之人，不配享有自由

children.text: Pas de liberté pour les ennemis de la liberté (Louis Antoine)

title: tears in rain
text: I've seen things you people wouldn't believe... Attack ships on fire off the shoulder of Orion... I watched C-beams glitter in the dark near the Tannhäuser Gate. All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain... Time to die. (movie Blade Runner, said Roy Batty)
